ProductInfo.Features:
Clear & Crisp Picture with 600TVL High Resolution; See in the Dark up to 65ft with Automatic Night Vision
Weather Resistant Housing; Easily Connect to TVs and DVRs
24/7 Record over 16 Days with 500GB HD; Connect to a TV or Monitor; View Online or On a Smart Phone
Easy USB Backup; Continuous Recording; 24/7 Scheduled Recording; Motion Detected Recording
Search by Date, Time or Event; Support PTZ via RS485 Connection; Included Mouse and Remote Control
